hackathon-description-text: If your idea of a great time includes a lack of sleep, great food and the company of 175 fellow students working tirelessly to design unique software solutions, you came to the right place.
hackathon-rules: Must be a University of Waterloo or Laurier Student.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=200 University Ave W, Waterloo, ON N2L 3G5, Canada
hackathon-location-address: 200 University Ave W, Waterloo, ON N2L 3G5, Canada
hackathon-description-header: Waterloo Hacks is a 46-hour hackathon open to students of varying skill levels. Waterloo Hacks is your chance to access world-class mentors, attend technical workshops and create something awesome.
